ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 59
ygData.msgSnippet: You are wrong  Your experiences with live steel weapons does not relate to a fantasy game.  You have no valid comparison to what damage a sword should do
ygData.messageBody:
You are wrong Your experiences with live steel weapons does not relate to a
fantasy game. You have no valid comparison to what damage a sword should do
versus a magical spell.

"Melee fighters should be able to do just as much damage, if not more [than
a caster]"
This would be totally imbalanced. If a warrior could could do that much
damage, and wear the best armor in the game, and have the most hp's, why
would anyone play anything else?

Warriors do less damage than a wizard BECAUSE they can stay in a fight
longer with the monster due to his greater hp's and armor. Over time, a
Warrior will do more damage that the Wizard. But it would wreck the game if
Warriors could deal damage as fast as Wizards.



Wayne
